document_data.mainbody:
The Yellow Serpent Border Cliffs was a long stretch of sheer rock that served as a natural boundary between part of the eastern Hordelands and western Shou Lung, specifically the provinces of Mai Yuan and Ching Tung.
The cliffs ran for hundreds of miles from the northernmost region of the Yehimal mountains near Nas Trango Shan to the peak of Shan Trango in the south.
Much of the cliff face was a sheer drop, including a dizzying  plunge at the Yellow Thunder Falls.
* Yellow Thunder Falls
* Takt Muren
* Silk Road
